abstract: Citigroup said the credit card data breach exposed the financial data of more than 360,000 customer accounts, about 80 percent more than it reported last week.
snippet: Citigroup said the credit card data breach exposed the financial data of more than 360,000 customer accounts, about 80 percent more than it reported last week.
lead_paragraph: The Citigroup credit card data breach exposed the private financial data of more than 360,000 customer accounts, about 80 percent more than it reported last week, according to a statement the bank released late Wednesday night.

headline.main: Citi Says Many More Customers Had Data Stolen by Hackers
headline.print_headline: Citi Says Many More Customers Had Data Stolen by Hackers
